title: 「ファイルが見つかりませんでした」表記のメールが消えない
content:
ファイルが見つかりませんでした。ファイルの場所を確認して再度試してください。 
   アドレスに大文字/小文字の違い、その他の間違いがないか確認してください。    ファイルの名前が変更、削除、または移動している可能性があります。

メッセージのコピーはこちら mid:20250720193325552457@saisoncard.co.jp

上記のメッセージが表示されますが、削除できません。 ローカルmailbox内に保存もされていません。 Trashも作り直しましたが無理でした。 差出人は最新のメールアドレスになっていてバグっています。

消す方法を教えてほしいです。
creator: sakuma2

title: Impossible to get messages only with pdf type of attachement via the filter in the message search
content:
PDF filter doesn't work

Trying to refine my search to get only emails with PDF files attachment, only get an empty list when mails with PDF are in the base for sure.

Step by step with screenshots here attached sorted by A, B, C.

A - Basic search with "pdf" 

     => 480 attachments files in emails

B - Filtering A search to get only mails from year 2025 

     => in 2025 only 27 emails with attachment - We see in the list result some emails with PDF files attached to it.

C - Trying to get only emails with PDF types attachment, clicking on the top left filter get nothing 

      => It's a bug i guess.

Ubuntu 24.04.3 LTS Thunderbird 140.4.0esr (64 bits)

On 18 November 2025
creator: jesus.nels

title: Will duplicates appear after conversion?
content: Most​‍​‌‍​‍‌​‍​‌‍​‍‌ of the duplicate records are from the original VCF files, the duplication sources are not from the conversion process. I performed the same conversion on multiple backup files with the help of GainTools vCard to CSV Converter and found that duplicates remained in the source. The way it works is to allow you to Convert VCF to CSV in a neat manner, keeping all data intact, while the free demo is there to let you have a quick look at the CSV before the final export. The product features of vCard 2.1, 3.0, and 4.0 support are there to make sure that no fields are lost. After the file conversion, duplicates can be removed easily with the help of Excel or Outlook tools. Good preparation will keep your contact list from becoming a mess and will guarantee that your imports are done ​‍​‌‍​‍‌​‍​‌‍​‍‌correctly.

title: All Messages shows date in April
content:
Dear Community,

I have installed Thunderbird on a new system and imported my mailbox and archives from my old Mac (both running macOS). I am currently using macOS Monterey 12.7.6 and Thunderbird 40.5.0 ESR (64-bit).

All messages—whether imported or newly received—both in the Inbox and in archives are showing the month as April (i.e., xx/4/xx). This issue also appears in the email body when replying or forwarding messages. Please note that the day and year are correct, only the month appears incorrectly as “4” (April)on all messages.

Messages in the imported local folder archives display the correct dates. I have email folders going back to 2006, and I would greatly appreciate your guidance to resolve this issue.

Many thanks in advance, Leonardo
creator: leonardo17

title: Via welke poort moet ik mail verzenden via gmail
content: Ik ben een paar weken geleden overgestapt van W10 naar W11, omdat het ondanks veel pogingen niet lukte om mail te zenden via Gmail - nadat het jaren goed was gegaan. Mail binnenhalen lukte in oktober 2025 wel en nu na opnieuw mail instellen ook. Ik heb na de overstap alle profielen van Thunderbird verwijderd en opnieuw automatisch een profiel aangemaakt met als gevolg imap.gmail.com voor inkomende en smtp.gmail.com voor uitgaande mail. Ik log in op mijn gmail account met hetzelfde ww als op accounts.google en authenticatie op 2auth0. Binnenhalen van mail gaat goed, maar zenden gaat nog steeds niet. Mijn poort 587 staat door de automatische configuratie ingesteld voor zenden, maar dat stond eerder ingesteld op poort 465. Moet ik dat weer op 465 zetten ? Ik hoor graag.
creator: e.boerwinkel

title: Thunderbird not recognizing Yahoo
content:

But Thunderbird remembered everything so re-installing didn't help. But I tried using the app password I'd generated for the last attempt - and that worked. It remains to be seem if it will when I open Thunderbird again . . .

title: Taalinstelling Thunderbird 145.0 (64 bits)
content: Hoewel "Nederlands" als taal is ingesteld, wordt in Thunderbird nu vermeld: Drafts, Sent, Spam en Trash, terwijl er voorheen stond Concepten, Verzonden, Spam en Prullenbak. Ik maak me daar zorgen over omdat door mij als Spam voorkomende e-mailberichten zodra aangeklikt / geselecteerd in de werkbalk "spam" verandert in "geen spam". Ik kan ze dus niet als spam aanmerken en ongelezen weggooien, maar alleen "verwijderen".
creator: r.viester

title: Problem to synch Inbox over IMAP
content:
Earlier this autumn my mail provider Telia changed mail platform, and I have problem that synching of Inbox is not working properly after that Thunderbird has been running for some time. Other folders are synched if I click on that folder. Then after some time time the Inbox is updated automatically again. Sometimes after a few hours, sometimes next morning. If I restart Thunderbird it work again for some time. Or if I change the "Connection security" field it also starts working for some time.

Is there somewhere some log to see why the synching stops?

/Bengt-Åke
creator: bengt-ake.ericsson

title: Thunderbird cannot connect to Comcast IMAP server
content: I've used Thunderbird for years. Just came back from vacation and I can no longer receive email from Comcast. I get a message stating timeout connecting to the IMAP server. I have tried removing my account and installing it again using the automatic installation. Still cannot connect to the server. Interestingly I send send an email which goes through even though I get an IMAP connection error. I have tried removing and reinstalling my account. I have gone onto Comcast and made sure that third party mail programs can have access. I do not have a VPN. I am using standard Windows Defender security. Never had a problem before this but I went in and put in an exclusion for Thunderbird anyway. Very frustrated, any help would be appreciated.
creator: danf2223

title: Hyper links from a sender are not active
content: Emails from a sender had HTML links that only appear as text and are not active (or underlined). I am using gmail. If I open the email directly in the Gmail app everything works as expected. If I forward the suspect to me at the same Gmail account, the links appear as they should. My default browser is correctly set as links in other emails open as they should. If I switch the "Message Body As" option from Original HTML to Plain Text, the links in question are now underlined and active. I am at a loss where to go from here. Any suggestions will be appreciated.

title: Вопрос по обновлению новой версии Thunderbird
content:
Hello!

1. I have a question about Thunderbird. Why does saving an email to the local hard drive take significantly longer in newer versions, for example Thunderbird Setup 144.0.1, compared to older versions like Thunderbird Setup 115.18.0? What could be the reason for this? How can this issue be resolved or what might be causing it?

2. Could you please inform me which parameters in the advanced settings have been added or changed in the new Thunderbird version 144.0.1 compared to version 115.18.0? Also, what might cause a significant increase in the time it takes to save a received email to the local hard drive in the new version?

Thank you in advance for your help!
creator: nikitamingazev579

title: can't delete "special account" named "server7.invalid" created by import
content: I'm just getting set up with Thunderbird. I used to use Postbox, and imported my Postbox profile into Thunderbird, which overall worked great – it got all my local email folders, and brought in my Apple email account, and so forth. The only wrinkly I've noticed so far is that it also created an account names "server7.invalid" that I can't delete. If I go to Account Settings, for "server7.invalid" it states "The following is a special account. There are no identities associated with it." The only items underneath it are "Spam Settings" and "Disk Space". There is no red Delete button for it, the way there is for my two real (IMAP) email accounts. Viewed on the Mail tab, it appears to contain on "Trash" and "Outbox", and both of those are empty. This weird invalid account doesn't seem to be doing any harm, but of course it is ugly and I just want it to go away. Help?
creator: bhaller

title: Connecting to RedTail
